Reviews.Title: Fits my Need.
Reviews.Author: GiGi
Reviews.Content: I have had a Kodak Easy Share digital camera for years. Still working great. I just wanted something smaller and thinner for easy carrying. I bought this camera on Black Friday at a great price and received it in a couple of days. I was surprised how fast it arrived. My pictures have been awesome and the camera is so easy to use. I love this camera. It does everything I need it to do and more. So far I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera With a FANTASTIC Price, but remember to buy a SDHC card!
Reviews.Author: Movie Maker "Rik"
Reviews.Content: Every year Amazon seems to come through with a full featured camera at an INSANE price for the holiday season- this year it is the outstanding Kodak MD55.  By nature, the EasyShare line is easy to use, with simple instructions (THANK YOU). This one is truly out of the box charge it up and you are ready to shoot.ONE VERY *VERY* IMPORTANT NOTE -it does NOT ship with a SDHC card- PLEASE do yourself a favor and be sure you have one . Though I cant imagine needing one this size, it will take up to a 32GB card. (Amazon Basics has nice cards in 8, 16 and 32's).video is fun to play with as wellPhoto quality is very nice in this 14MP point-and-shoot, and the 720P video is fun to play with.  I also like the dedicated "share" button which can send your pictures to Twitter, Facebook YouTube and other sites.At this price, you cant really go wrong- you just might find this as your go-to camera, more so than some that are much more expensive!

Reviews.Title: Hate it!
Reviews.Author: amanda2012
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera right after Thanksgiving thinking I was getting a great deal.  Not only do I HATE it, but it went $20 lower a couple weeks ago! Wish I had returned it right away. The response time is really slow, after you take a picture it takes a couple seconds to get the screen back so you can take another. This camera has some great features but I'm sick of seeing the "processing" screen. Also, the low lighting settings are horrible! I had to go in manually to change them as the flash washes EVERYTHING out. I bought this camera because a friend of mine has a Kodak and it seems to be really nice, but this one is awful! My advice is MOVE ALONG, spend the extra $$ for a Canon, Olympus or Lumix.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Nessa
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my grandma.  I got it out and charged it up before I gave it to her and I loved using it.  The controls are really simple and easy to use.  It charges fast and the display is large and bright.  She has had it a few weeks and uses it all the time.  It doesn't have the bells and whistles of some other point and shoots, but it is exactly what we were looking for.

Reviews.Title: can't beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Singh "singhashley"
Reviews.Content: I'm a photographer and I shoot with a 5D Mark II when I'm working, I wanted a little point and shoot that I could just throw in my purse so I could get some snap shots of my girls without getting my giant camera. This has been great so far! My Aunt bought it for me and the pictures look fine....great MP for a point and shoot. Very happy with this camera so far!

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare MD55 14 MP digital camera
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoy the new camera.  I like the plug in "in charging" battery system as our old camera had a bulky docking station.  The clear crisp brightness of the photos make me very happy on my purchase.  It is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Neat Facebook Sharing Feature
Reviews.Author: B. Barnett
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for a friend, it was a great price and when I received it I realized how much of a great value it was.  I could just kick myself for not getting two since, after seeing the camera, someone else really like it too. It is very compact- perfect for in a purse or pocket. It takes amazing pictures for general use and the Facebook sharing button right on it is perfect for the person that can't help but post pictures constantly. Even if you're not a Facebook addict, with the 14 MP and the optical zoom this is a great product. I would highly recommend it for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: nygirl
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son who will be traveling overseas. Great pictures , big screen but without the optional card, the internal memory only held 8 pictures.  Not a big deal,just thought to mention. Great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: WOW Great camera.
Reviews.Author: fussy
Reviews.Content: I hesitated and read reviews on which camera to buy. Finally settled on this Kodak.  So glad I did. It takes clear sharp pictures and is easy to use. Quality seems first rate and at such a great price.  I don't know what more anyone could want in a camera.  Just love it. Kodak EasyShare MD55 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: vert happy
Reviews.Author: jess
Reviews.Content: I had never ordered any item off of Amazon.  Need a point and shoot camers... Bought the Kodak EasyShare MD55 14 MP Digital Camera5X Optical Zoom.  The web site is easy to use and I got a great price and it was shipped free and got here in days.  People that have Iphones try to move my review pix by touching them...lol  they didn't know that it is a camera....  When I opened it, it said to push a button for language and I pushed wrong button and got German.  Nephew fixed it... I highly recommend Amazon for your purchases.  I should have ordered a hard case, but I put it in an eyeglasses case... Love it!

Reviews.Title: I Expected More
Reviews.Author: Dale C. Fuqua
Reviews.Content: It's lightweight and pocket-sized and was a good price but...it started with not being able to attach the strap, to this day I can't get it on.  The Kodak website has got video insntructions for many models, but not for this one.It came with an SD card, but I soon discovred it is either a dud or I'm not understanding the instructions to format it, which I learned upon trying to take videos, the camera instructing me to put in the card which is already installed.  I find it tricky sometimes not to accidentally take a picture because  of the location of the buttons as you hold it.  Speaking of holding, no matter how much I hold my breath and carefully snap a picture, indoor pictures are inevetiabely blurry.  I haven't taken many pcitures outside yet. I like Kodak as an American Icon company and want their products to be the best, but...

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: tables
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my mother in law for Christmas.  It was fast shipping and was packed well.  It looks like a good camera for her since she doesn't want alot of buttons and stuff.  She wants to be able to point and shoot and develop the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Camera stopped working from one day to another ...
Reviews.Author: duralt
Reviews.Content: I received this camera and use it for an hour, I leave it charging overnight and the next day when I went to use them again, had a message on the screen which said objective blocked and will not let me use the camera.The strange thing is that the camera has not been dropped or has been beaten at least some of it was in the delivery of the package.

Reviews.Title: Best affordable camera
Reviews.Author: Glenn P "lefty guitarist"
Reviews.Content: The photos from this camera are of a clearly superior quality to my iphone, and it is very easy to use. If you want a dedicated digital camera, buy this one!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Lacey Blosser
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product. It takes great pictures and has many different settings, edit, crop..options. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Hermes Alvarado Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: This camera is ok, for a few dollars i get a very good device, what can I say, I am please with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Slowwwwwww!
Reviews.Author: G. S.
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a year and an half now, and it's the worst camera out there, it's so slow, I hate when that blue "processing" screen comes in everytime after you take  a picture....don't buy it. One star is even too much for how slow this camera is. Plus the facebook easyshare is so bad, you can't even use it, the software sucks....worst camera ever....

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share Camera
Reviews.Author: Carol Horrigan
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed this camera for a few years now; and it is still taking nice pictures, even though the technology have improved.  I will continue to use this until it no longer works!  Thanks Kodak for a great camera

Reviews.Title: Always an issue...
Reviews.Author: Jana Wygal
Reviews.Content: I have had several Kodak's before, but this camera locks up a lot (freezes) to where you can't take a picture or shut it off. The only way I have found to get it out of the "freeze" is to remove the battery & replace it. It takes a long time to take pics, so don't be in a hurry. This is not a good camera to shoot kiddos, as it takes a long time for the camera to be ready to take another picture. If you need something that can take pic after pic in a fairly quick sequence, this is NOT the camera you want. If you have about 10-20 seconds to wait in between pics...you will be fine. Size is good, picture quality is good, but the performance is not so good :(

Reviews.Title: very satisfied with my article for the good price and the quality he has is the best buy thanks alot
Reviews.Author: Vladimir Asencio
Reviews.Content: very satisfied with my article for the good price and the quality he has is the best buy thanks alot

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: oscar luis astudillo
Reviews.Content: gran calidad en la fotos y videos . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare MD55
Reviews.Author: Sandy, Bend Or
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a Christmas presant and he loved it. He had a very old camera and was thrilled with the new advancess.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this camera!
Reviews.Author: Alex Julian
Reviews.Content: It is the worst Digital Camera ever!! Does NOT match my expectations!! I gave it to my 2 years and 10 months baby girls to play with... I bought a Sony one.

Reviews.Title: Kodak
Reviews.Author: Ag
Reviews.Content: Good quality product. I recommend Beautifully presented and works perfectly. I expected when I thought about buying this product. Good

Reviews.Title: You get what you paid for!
Reviews.Author: M. Choudhury "illusion"
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid, can't complain too much about the item. Takes great video in bright light but I'm not that happy about the indoor video. I also don't like the fact that it doesn't have a flash when taking a picture. The biggest frustration is when I'm trying to open the Micro SD / HDMI slot. You have to struggle with both hands and if you don't have long nails...good luck. I'm doubtful if anyone has been able to open the slot with one hand. I have never found any electronic device that requires so much work and attention to open a slot.

Reviews.Title: Very fragile, and not covered by warranty
Reviews.Author: Shawn Peno
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my wife for Christmas 2011.  In August 2012, the LCD stopped working.  She used it, gave it to me, I put it down on a table, came back later and the LCD was not working.  Well, not a big deal, that is why there is a warranty.I called Kodak, and returned it to them (my expense) and about a week later they replied that I voided the warranty because it was "bumped" and the LCD was supposedly cracked.  There is no way to prove or disprove this, as it is their word against mine.  Now I am being told that for $50 they will replace the screen.  Why would I spend $50 to replace a screen on a camera that I spent $70 on to buy new?If this is the quality of their craftsmanship, no wonder they went bankrupt!  I have had digital cameras from other companies that survived a tour in Iraq, and years of use while no showing any signs of problems.  This one gets placed on a table and fails.Customer service is poor at best.  If you call, hope you get someone who cares.I would gave it two stars as the camera worked pretty well prior to this incident, and my wife likes the quality of the photos and features, but the quality of the camera is poor.

Reviews.Title: Takes nice pictures.
Reviews.Author: Joan Peno
Reviews.Content: If you want a nice easy point and click digital, this is the little guy for you. If you don't want a super fancy camera that you need to take a class to figure out... this is the one. The zoom function is great, and then you can open the picture and zoom some more. My picture s come out nice and clear. Has a video record feature. I throw it in a pocket in my purse and have it with me all the time.  Great for someone starting out, going to college, interested in hiking and not wanting a lot of weight. Just get a hard case for it and your golden

Reviews.Title: A good camera for its price
Reviews.Author: Maverick from sky
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my parents. This is easy to use, not so complicated camera that everyone would love to operate. (by everyone I mean a bit older people)The image quality is decent. I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: Carrillo Commerce
Reviews.Content: The camera works just fine, the pictures are clear and bright, amazing colors. The price was also a plus. I would definitely purchase again as a gift or for myself.

Reviews.Title: Good for this prize......
Reviews.Author: bharat
Reviews.Content: Good result as per prize..... I buy this for my sister in india... I just worry @ its warranty in india is valid or not?I was on vacation and its battery not last long....useless....I want to replace my battery because it is still in warrenty.....

Reviews.Title: kodak easy share -- IS EASY
Reviews.Author: Ronald Fogarty "grannyF"
Reviews.Content: I got the Kodak easy share hoping it was what it said it was -- EASY-- and to my surprise it is!!! This grandma loves it esp. when visiting my daughters twins :)from set up- power up to first shoot it was very simple,  getting the pictures into my computer took this grandma a little longer but now I am a pro. I would say this is an awesome camera for someone who needs to keep it simple. Kodak EasyShare MD55 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)  love it !!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Majik13
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on this camera! It takes great pictures and is very easy to use and the easy share button makes sharing photos very easy. I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Sparkle
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price. Takes great pictures. Went to a Christmas party where everyone took pics, but out of all the cameras there, this camera took the best pics and the lighting was great also.

Reviews.Title: compact, good image quality
Reviews.Author: R. Myers
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera as an upgrade to my last Kodak Z740. Went from 5MP up to 14MP, much smaller and lighter than the older model. Also, better battery life. So far no complaints.

Reviews.Title: EasyShare MD55
Reviews.Author: bwtbuyer
Reviews.Content: We got a good price and fast shipping.  This camera is shared among a group of people in our office area.  It has worked great so far.  We use it to document various aspects of our operation (water treatment) and have been very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EashShare MD55 Great Little Everyday Camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Brown
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the Kodak EasyShare MD55.  It arrived on time and exactly as described in the description.  I bought it as a gift for my 68 year old mother, who really has a problem with new technology.  She was able to operate the Kodak Easy Share with ease.  It is well worth what I paid for it, perhaps more.  I really don't have a bad thing to say about the product.  Synced it with her computer and she is set to go.  It is very thin and light weight as described.  I would absolutely recommend this camera for everyday use or whichever you choose.  It has several options to choose from that are kind of fancy which is a nice little surprise.  I am very happy with the fact that you don't have to use regular batteries, it comes with a rechargeable battery which is such a nice feature, you just plug it in to charge and your good to.

Reviews.Title: EasyShare MD55 A decent point and shoot for the money
Reviews.Author: Buddy's Mom
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and has a generous size display screen. Selecting a setting on a per picture basis obtains the best picture results as the Smart Capture mode pictures come out too dark in the dark areas and too light in the light areas. Picture quality is good overall. The zoom feature is limited in it's true close up capacity. The old adage is true:you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easy share
Reviews.Author: Thomas Fultz
Reviews.Content: This a great camera, it was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she LOVED it. It takes great pictures and is so easy to use. The price was awesome and I got free next day shipping right before Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Great entry level camera
Reviews.Author: GameShowGuy
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrific for those who are just getting started in photography.  Took it with me on 2 recent trips and it perform very well.  The zoom is great and the pictures themselves come out really nice.  It's perfect for teens and college students who don't have  alot of money to spend and need a great product.  This product delivers.

Reviews.Title: Good choice!
Reviews.Author: Monika
Reviews.Content: I bought this product in december last year as a gift for someone who wanted a Kodak camera (she has another 2 old Kodak cameras) and she's very happy and satisfied using it so I think that I made a good choice buying Kodak EasyShare(14 MP)Digital Camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great value!
Reviews.Author: Amy_la08
Reviews.Content: Great camera, works perfect, very easy to use, light weight, battery lasts for a long time, easy shots, love the scene modes, works perfect for fireworks! Great value and arrival!

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: Kurt
Reviews.Content: Wouldn't read the memory card. The zoom would stick sometimes and worst of all the operating system its just terrible. But the return was quick and free

Reviews.Title: Second Easy Share - Love it!
Reviews.Author: elaine stonebraker
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on this when I thought I'd misplaced my other Easyshare, and this is the one I use all the time now. I thought I loved the older one, but this is even more incredible! Instead of inexplicable icons, there are beautiful pictures to display exactly what you get if you use a particular setting. The colors are just so vibrant, and I've gotten many, many compliments on the pix I've shared on FB.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Engineer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a nice easy to use Point ans Shoot camera for my parents.  I needed a camera that would be easy to use and not complex to setup.  This camera fulfilled both of those needs.  It takes clear nice pictures and has a great optical zoom.  The zoom switch is placed a little awkward compared to other cameras.  Extremely happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Product fine
Reviews.Author: Daniel A. Villablanca
Reviews.Content: my products nice. Very Good. than you. experince fine. Good, Very Good... than Amazon. my products nice. Very Good. than you. experince fine. Good, Very Good... than Amazon.

Reviews.Title: good product..but...
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: It is a great product.However, my delete button is not working.I don't know either it's from the settings or whatever?Can u offer a technical support??

Reviews.Title: It's great with perfect price!!
Reviews.Author: Avon
Reviews.Content: It's a Xmas gift for my 8 years old son, and it's great and a lot of good functions. Both of us are loves it. And also it's a great price!!I'm going to get one for myself if it has a different color. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great easy operating camera!
Reviews.Author: Kate M. Luginbuhl "Firefighter Kate"
Reviews.Content: Fast and efficient service... Great easy operating camera... My granddaughter is only 9, but loves photography and takes great pictures... This is her third camera... she upgrades every few years and she LOVES her new camera...

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a young photographer
Reviews.Author: Kelly Peters
Reviews.Content: I have a 10-y.o. niece who wanted an "adult" camera. After reading the reviews, this seemed like a good fit. I did not want to spend too much on a camera, but I also wanted to make sure I got a good product. My niece LOVES this camera. She is practicing taking pictures with it. As with anyone who is first starting to learn how to use a digital camera, many of her photos are a bit blurry, but the pictures that I take seem to be very good quality, and the camera has a decent amount of zoom (at least enough for the current owner). You definitely need to purchase a separate memory disk for this camera; without a memory disk, this camera can only hold about 12 photos. My niece REALLY likes the "share" functions, since you can easily plug in the camera to a computer and instantly add your photos to social-networking sites and online photo journals. That said, we had a serious discussion about the quality and type of photos that she can take and how, once it's online, you can never truly delete a picture. Finally, the camera can also take short videos, but there is no audio. My niece has not used this function very much because she prefers to have audio with her video. All-in-all, this camera is relatively easy to use (we were able to use it within seconds of taking it out of the box), and is a great option for a burgeoning photographer.

Reviews.Title: Great piece of equipment
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: This camera is what I was looking for.I keep It in the glove box of my truck so it is going to take a beating.I took pictures af my wifes Christmas lights at night by trying the anti blur It was great.It is the size of my cell phone an fits my shirt pocket.Great camera and not expensive.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Tpage5589
Reviews.Content: Shipped fast. Great product. My mother inlaw loved her Christmas gift. Very nice camera, easy to use as well. sleek,slender fits easy in pocket or purse

Reviews.Title: EZ to use
Reviews.Author: Robert B
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price. Fits in a shirt or pants pocket easily. I do not like that you have to be on-line to download pics to your computer.  But you have tremendous storage with a flash drive.

Reviews.Title: Love The Camers
Reviews.Author: mobatie
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my daughter, and she loves it. She has a new baby and will be taking lots of pictures.The bundle that came with this was handy and a good price for the 3 items together.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: Trav
Reviews.Content: This Camera is great! I wanted to get a new camera so I decided to get the same brand. Its definitely slimmer and I like that it has a rechargeable battery. It can take 3, 6, 10, 12, or 14 megapixel pictures. It also has a separate button for video recording which comes in handy once in a while. I like that you can actually hear the sound when you play back on this camera. It's very slim and lightweight. I know there is a Kodak easy share touch out there, so if you like touchscreen you could buy that one. But if you can live without it, then this camera could be for you.In the box it also comes with a strap in case it falls, a rechargeable battery, a charger and the camera itself. Make sure you purchase an SD card SEPARATELY. It does not come with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Dilum Bandara
Reviews.Content: Nice camera that's worth the price. Have all the basic features & good picture & video quality. Though it can recognize faces & tag pictures, it will not shoot automatically when it detect a face. Has 4MB inbuilt memory which also store Kodak software.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Great camera easy to use and love that it just recharges rather than taking batteries  ...great buy for the price and is small enough to fit in your pocket overall a great buy

Reviews.Title: GOOD FOR PRICE
Reviews.Author: Richard P. Jordan
Reviews.Content: SHARE SOFTWARE NOT NEEDED, GOOD PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE NICE PICTURES . RECEVIED CAMERA 2 DAYS AFTER ORDER PLACED JUST IN TIME FOR HOLIDAY SHOTS OF FRIENDS AND FAMILY

Reviews.Title: Crapy camera
Reviews.Author: ThroatBeard "D"
Reviews.Content: There's absolutely no image stabilization in this camera.  Every picture is blurry....every one!!!  Price was ok, quality not so much.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Lugo
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. A nightmare to install, I still can't get it to work. "Easy" Yeah right- I've had other cameras, this one is annoying.

Reviews.Title: Blurry when you change the setting
Reviews.Author: kates1937
Reviews.Content: The camera was a great price, small, easy to use, but when we changed the setting from Smart Capture to "Sports" or a night time setting, then tried to change it back, many of the pictures came out blurry-- just regular, daylight, still pictures. I had this problem with another Kodak camera. My advice would be leave it on the Smart Capture setting or buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Froze after 1 week of use...
Reviews.Author: Mom of 2
Reviews.Content: I really liked this camera at first. After only 1 week, though, it froze with the lens out. I couldn't get it to charge or do anything. After playing with it for awhile I finally got it to start working again, but returned it immediately. I've since purchased a different brand.
